#summary How to setup Wifi Static IP

=== Why static IP? ===
If DHCP is not working (=wifi cannot connect to your access point), you might need to setup IP manually:<br><br>

=== Wi-Fi static IP setup: ===
  * go on Wireless & networks > Wi-fi settings 
  * click Home button > Advanced > Use static IP
  * add an IP and the rest of setings from your network range,click back button and that's it.
